root.name: Mohawk & Headphone Jack
root.description: GameplayThe players goal in each level is to collect enough CD's in order to open the next level. There is a CD counter in the top left that tells the player how many CD's they have. The exit appears as an X on the players map and go's to the next level when found. Different CD's are worth different amounts of points. CD's also unlock soundtracks to listen to.
